mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM r, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_GROUND ORDER BY GROUNDNUM) a) b WHERE b.r BETWEEN ${startNum} AND ${endNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_GROUNDHOTTIME (GROUNDFEENUM, GROUNDNUM, GROUNDWEEK, GROUNDTIME, GROUNDHOTTIMEFEE) VALUES(seq_groundfeenum.nextval, seq_groundnum.CURRVAL, 0, #{weekDaytime}, #{weekDayHotTimeFee})
INSERT INTO TBL_GROUNDHOTTIME (GROUNDFEENUM, GROUNDNUM, GROUNDWEEK, GROUNDTIME, GROUNDHOTTIMEFEE) VALUES(seq_groundfeenum.nextval, seq_groundnum.CURRVAL, 1, #{weekEndtime}, #{weekEndHotTimeFee})
